00021 #pragma once
00022 #include "../tools.hpp"
00023 #include <triqs/utility/arithmetic_ops_by_cast.hpp>
00024 #include <triqs/utility/kronecker.hpp>
00025 
00026 namespace triqs {
00027 namespace gfs {
00028 
00040  struct matsubara_freq : public utility::arithmetic_ops_by_cast_disable_same_type<matsubara_freq, std::complex<double>> {
00041   int n;
00042   double beta;
00043   statistic_enum statistic;
00044   matsubara_freq() : n(0), beta(1), statistic(Fermion) {}
00045   matsubara_freq(int n_, double beta_, statistic_enum stat_) : n(n_), beta(beta_), statistic(stat_) {}
00046   using cast_t = std::complex<double>;
00047   operator cast_t() const {
00048    return {0, M_PI * (2 * n + statistic) / beta};
00049   }
00050  };
00051 
00052  inline std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, matsubara_freq const &y) { return out << std::complex<double>(y); }
00053 
00054  inline matsubara_freq operator+(matsubara_freq const &x, matsubara_freq const &y) {
00055   return {x.n + y.n + (x.statistic & y.statistic), x.beta, ((x.statistic ^ y.statistic) == 1 ? Fermion : Boson)};
00056  }
00057 
00058  inline matsubara_freq operator-(matsubara_freq const &x, matsubara_freq const &y) {
00059   return {x.n - y.n - (~x.statistic & y.statistic), x.beta, ((x.statistic ^ y.statistic) == 1 ? Fermion : Boson)};
00060  }
00061 
00062  inline matsubara_freq operator-(matsubara_freq const &mp) {
00063   return {-(mp.n + (mp.statistic == Fermion ? 1 : 0)), mp.beta, mp.statistic};
00064  }
00065 
00066  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00068  template <bool IsFreq> struct matsubara_domain {
00069   using point_t = typename std::conditional<IsFreq, std::complex<double>, double>::type;
00070   double beta;
00071   statistic_enum statistic;
00072   matsubara_domain(double beta, statistic_enum s) : beta(beta), statistic(s) {
00073    if (beta < 0) TRIQS_RUNTIME_ERROR << "Matsubara domain construction :  beta <0 : beta =" << beta << "\n";
00074   }
00075   matsubara_domain() : matsubara_domain(1, Fermion) {}
00076   matsubara_domain(matsubara_domain const &) = default;
00077   matsubara_domain(matsubara_domain<!IsFreq> const &x) : matsubara_domain(x.beta, x.statistic) {}
00078   bool operator==(matsubara_domain const &D) const { return ((std::abs(beta - D.beta) < 1.e-15) && (statistic == D.statistic)); }
00079 
00081   friend void h5_write(h5::group fg, std::string subgroup_name, matsubara_domain const &d) {
00082    h5::group gr = fg.create_group(subgroup_name);
00083    h5_write(gr, "beta", d.beta);
00084    h5_write(gr, "statistic", (d.statistic == Fermion ? "F" : "B"));
00085   }
00086 
00088   friend void h5_read(h5::group fg, std::string subgroup_name, matsubara_domain &d) {
00089    h5::group gr = fg.open_group(subgroup_name);
00090    double beta;
00091    std::string statistic;
00092    h5_read(gr, "beta", beta);
00093    h5_read(gr, "statistic", statistic);
00094    d = matsubara_domain(beta, (statistic == "F" ? Fermion : Boson));
00095   }
00096 
00097   //  BOOST Serialization
00098   friend class boost::serialization::access;
00099   template <class Archive> void serialize(Archive &ar, const unsigned int version) {
00100    ar &TRIQS_MAKE_NVP("beta", beta);
00101    ar &TRIQS_MAKE_NVP("statistic", statistic);
00102   }
00103  };
00104 
00105  using matsubara_freq_domain = matsubara_domain<true>;
00106  using matsubara_time_domain = matsubara_domain<false>;
00107 
00108 
00109  // ----- kronecker function : overload for matsubara_freq 
00110  inline bool kronecker(matsubara_freq const & freq) { return freq.n == 0; }
00111  inline bool kronecker(matsubara_freq const & f1, matsubara_freq const &f2) { return f1.n == f2.n; }
00112 }
00113 }
